root.name: Taiko Drum Master
root.description: GameplaySymbols moving horizontally along a timeline show what to hit and when. Home versions distinguish single and double strikes, arcade versions hard and soft strikes.Normal size notes are single strikes. Bigger sized notes are double strikes.Red notes require hitting within the left or right of the drum face. Blue notes require hitting the rim of the drum. Successful play builds up a life meter, which if it gets past a certain point by the end of the song, the song is passed.Song List (plus difficulties)Licensed rock/pop ABC -- Jackson 5 American Girls -- Counting Crows Are You Gonna Be My Girl -- Jet Girls Boys -- Good Charlotte I'm a Believer -- The Monkees Jimmy Neutron Theme -- Bowling for Soup Killer Queen -- Queen Lady Marmalade -- Labella Love Shack -- B-52's Material Girl -- Madonna My Sharona -- The Knack Rock the Dragon -- Dragon Ball Z Theme Slide -- The Goo Goo Dolls That's the Way (I Like It) -- KC and the Sunshine Band The Impression That I Get -- The Mighty Mighty Bosstones Toxic -- Britney Spears Tubthumping -- Chumbawamba Walking on Sunshine -- Jump5 ClassicalBeethoven's Symphony No. 5 Carmen Prelude Foster's Medley Hungarian Dances No. 5 Symphony No. 25 in G Minor William Tell Overture Namco originalsDon Rangers Dragon Spirit Katamari on the Rocks Ridge Racer SOULCALIBUR II Brave Sword, Braver Soul Taiko March The Genji and the Heike Clans Saitama 2000
